subject: Brake pedal is bent
description_text:
As you can see the Brake pedal is bent, only discovered through routine cleaning, what can we do? I’ve only had them since April I believe 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Jordan Strandt,    Please provide your order number and a video clip so that we can determine the location and cause of the bend. Don't worry, we will repair or replace it for you.

I won’t be able to until I get back from Montreal, I was hoping for a quick resolution, as I sim race a ton, it needs to be replaced 
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Jordan Strandt,    You can provide your order number first, and we can resend it for you.

8199913212047039 Here is my order ID 

My address is 41-3449 Hallberg rd 
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Jordan Strandt,  You can try tightening and aligning the panel screws with a hex screw and wrench. This should normally solve the issue, unless the pedal arm itself is bent.

I will take the arm off when I get back, but I suspect it is bent 
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Jordan Strandt,  Please take a photo to confirm—it might simply be that the panel screws have loosened.

My gf did have a look and said everything is tight on the pedal 
Sent from my iPhone

>

Hi Jordan Strandt,  Could you please provide photos of the brake from multiple angles to confirm exactly where it is bent? At the moment, I don’t see any visible bending—simply readjusting the brake plate seems to have resolved the issue.

It’s unable to be adjusted, the pedal face is twisted in the photos, it’s bent, I’ll get my gf to send me the pics as I’m currently in Medicine Hat going to Montreal 
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Jordan Strandt,   We will send you a brand-new pedal arm, including the pedal plate and bottom screws. Would you be able to replace it by yourself?

Yes I can do that myself, looks fairly easy to be honest 
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Jordan Strandt,  I have informed the AliExpress operations team, and they will contact you to arrange the replacement shipment.
Hi Jordan Strandt,  Could you please provide the contact name, phone number, and shipping address so that we can proceed with the next steps as soon as possible?

Jordan Strandt, 437-533-2743, Unit 41 3449 Hallberg rd, Ladysmith, BC V9G1L2
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Jordan Strandt,  Dear, your order has been shipped. The logistics number is:YT2523800703623683. You can track it at this website https://www.17track.net/zh-cn
